issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Running libhdfs tests in mac fails

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: OS X uses {{DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH}} instead of {{LD_LIBRARY_PATH}} to control the dynamic link path.  If we set {{DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH}} in the test configuration, then we can run native tests on Mac.
fields.summary: Native tests fail on OS X, because DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH is not defined to include libhadoop.dylib.

comments.body: I'm attaching a patch with just the Surefire configuration changes spun out of HDFS-3296.
+1, given I'm already running this patch. lol
Haha, thanks.  :-)  I'll commit after I get a pre-commit response.

Thanks, Allen.  I cherry-picked this to branch-2 and branch-2.8, so that you would not have to experience the horror of checking out the branches that you find so repugnant.  :-)
